121.content:
One day, after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War and the foiling of Obito and Madara's Moon's Eye Plan, the Sixth Hokage Naruto Uzumaki was experimenting with Kurama's chakra. His dad, the Fourth Hokage, before returning to the afterlife, had sealed the Yin half of the nine-tail's chakra inside of him to grant his son full access to his true potential as a jinchuuriki, and while the boost in power meant that Naruto's raw physical and spiritual strength was on a whole other level from anyone else alive, there were...

...certain drawbacks.

Such as having to all but relearn advanced chakra control from scratch. The sudden spike in his chakra levels, from having Kurama's full power sealed inside his body, did his already somewhat spotty control absolutely no favors.

Plus, Kurama had been acting real weird, recently...

"Now," said the bijuu within him, speaking with a strangely... husky... voice, "Send a bit of my chakra into your shadow clone. If you do it right," Something about the tone this was said in gave him all sorts of weirdly, inappropriately pleasant feelings in the pit of his stomach. "You should be able to control the chakra even as if it was still attached to you. This technique will do much for your control of my power, and also comes with certain... other benefits, as well."

Naruto did not ask what these other benefits might be. He was not sure how much he would -- or would not -- like the answer.

Still, though, he did as Kurama asked, sending a bit of the completed nine-tail's chakra into the network of his shadow clone. It wasn't enough to form a chakra cloak, or anything like that, but he could still feel a slight metaphysical tugging in his navel, which told him that he had succeeded.

He grinned a bit, looking at his clone, and he could feel Kurama's chakra inside of it. And now, doing as Kurama instructed, he focused on molding the chakra in his shadow clone -- not the clone's chakra, but rather only the small amount of Kurama's chakra that he had sent into it.

He felt the chakra twist and contort as he molded it -- sort of like dough in his hands, except just in his head. Kinda.

The clone got a funny look on its face, though, as he molded the chakra, and suddenly it...

16 year old Naruto Uzumaki, Ninja Academy washout who failed too terribly to even take a remedial second year, hummed idly to himself as he walked to his business, a spa recently built near the kunoichi hot springs, meaning more often than not, his clientele are kunoichi looking for some down time after some missions, mainly of the chunin and jonin rankings.

When he was kicked out of the Academy due to his frankly terrible grades and performance reviews, with his targeting scores were practically nonexistent and his taijutsu skills were just as bad, as well as him barely able to learn the Kawarimi and Henge due to his grades. Apparently, sheer determination and guts don't matter in the academic department if you are failing too horribly to recover.

So, now officially the first person to flunk out of the Academy in decades, Naruto wandered Konoha during the day, wondering what he can do instead, since ninja life was apparently not for him. He later ran into a massage parlor after a prank to relieve boredom got ANBU attention, where the owner, an old man named Fuujiro, unofficially took him in (much to Naruto's initial protests) and taught him the tricks of the trade, from the much required anatomy lessons, to even acupressure points, though that didn't sank in thanks to Naruto's disgust with needles making it hard for him to concentrate.

Now, with a last gift from the slightly demented old man in the form of a locked box he got from his father, who got it from his father, who got it from his father, who won it off of a friend in a shogi match. The contents, while unknown due to the fact no one in the family knew how to get rid of the seal-based lock (they have tried fire many times), sound like something glassy and liquid like is in them.

Once at his personal station, Naruto looked over the locked box his master gave him before kicking him out the door, squinting and rubbing his chin in thought. "Now, how do I get this to open?" The blond thought aloud, tapping the seal on the lock. He suddenly felt a tiny blade bit his finger. "YEOW!" The surprised masseur yelled, leaping back and put his finger in his mouth. "What the hell?" He muttered, giving the box a squinted glare. "What kind of seal does that?" He muttered, not knowing the intricacies of seals, which, had he been a ninja, he would have known that this particular seal was a blood protection seal with a flame eating seal and a seal that would take in blood added to its matrix.

The seal glowed red, before a series of unlocking sounds went off. "How protected is this thing?" He wondered with a sweat-drop, then jumped in alarm when it suddenly swung open with a clank. Naruto looked inside to see... massaging oils in different-colored glass bottles. "Ah mou! All that just for some oils?!" He yelled, slapping a hand on his head in exasperation. He already had some, and got them recently too, so he's fully stocked on that front!

What happens now?

"Hello, Inuzuka Hana-san. Welcome to my humble parlor." Naruto said, bowing to a indifferent Hana, who honestly wanted to be elsewhere. Hana is the heiress of the Inuzuka, a ninja clan that is rumored to wolf blood flowing in them, due to their feral features and the fact they raise ninja dogs for their special tag-team jutsu, and are also noted for the red marks on their face that look like giant teeth.

Hana, however, was not an average Inuzuka, since she took more after her father, with her younger brother Kiba looking more like a typical Inuzuka. She also was too much work and too little play, and in fact, her mother/clan leader/superior Jounin Tsume Inuzuka booked her reservation to get Hana out of her work longer than her lunch breaks and quitting times.

"It does look nice." Hana said neutrally, looking around and sniffing, wrinkling her nose a bit at the fragrance of incense. Oh, have I mentioned that the Inuzuka have noses almost as strong as a dog's own? "Let's get this over with, I have a check-up to perform." She said, walking over to the changing station. Naruto quickly looked over his book and just noticed that Tsume ordered it for Hana. Most likely, the mother sprung this on her workaholic daughter. 'Then again, Fuu-jiisan would pull similar stuff on me, crazy old coot.' Naruto mused mentally.

-----

Once at his station, Naruto inspected the bottles within the formerly-locked chest, the first being a blue bottle with a spiral marking on it. "'Body & Soul are At Bliss'... Hmm. Fancy name; better be good." Naruto muttered as he looked over the bottle, wondering what ingredient was put into the concoction. He then placed it down and went to escort Hana in and onto his massage table, than briefly stepped to let her get comfortable, with only a towel draped across her shapely backside.

"Alright, just relax, Inuzuka-san." Naruto said, putting some of the oil in his hand and started to spread it over her bare back, unaware of the fact he used the oil that would allow him total control over her.

A lone person was walking alone down a rocky path that led to one of the many villages within the Land of Lightning. This person was wearing attire consisting of a black tunic with a white long sleeved shirt underneath, leather gloves, a pair of dark pants and steel toe capped boots. Strapped to his back with the hilts coming over his shoudler were two swords, a Jain and a Tanto. Completing this look was a dark brown hooded cloak that had been adjusted by the person to drape over his shoudlers concealing his attire from the world.

Behind this person were the bodies of ninja moaning and groaning painfully as they lay in their own blood as it pooled around them. All of them had stab and slash marks marring their bodies. These were ninja tasked by Kumogakure no Sato's Raikage to try and recruit him and when he refused they tried bringing him back to Kumogakure by force. Of course since their basically bleeding out on the ground it is safe to say they failed.

The mysterious person let out a deep sigh and started muttering incoherently. His deep voice revealing it was a teenager of 17 years. This is Naruto Uzumaki, former Genin and now a notorious Missing Nin of Konohagakure and the Jinchuuriki of the Nine Tailed fox. He is well known for stopping the mysterious Akatsuki and saving the Jinchuuriki from getting kidnapped by the mysterious organization.

"I'm getting tired of this crap." The teenager muttered angrily to himself, completely fed up with how these ninja try to recruit him to their forces. "I should have went back to the ruins of Uzushiogakure once I finished the Akatsuki off. I would have found peace and quiet there."

The hooded teenager continued his way down the rocky path, ignoring the bleeding out ninja behind him.

X.X.X.X

15 minutes later

Yugito Nii stared at the bodies of her wounded comrades with shocked eyes. They were on the verge of death now and didn't have much time left in this world. Their life force pooled around them, while their torsos were marred with stab and slash wounds. She clenched her shaking fists at her sides as her eyes narrowed in rage.

She went ahead to see the status of the team that was sent to get in contact with the missing nin and recruit him. If he refused then they were to force him to join Kumogakure. However, since they had not reported back in 30 minutes Yugito went ahead and that is where we find her now.

Yugito hearing one of her comrades letting out a weak moan quickly knelt down beside him. "What happened here?" She questioned with a stern look.

"We underestimated his skills, Lady Yugito." The dying nin groaned out. "He sealed off our chakra one by one and finished us off." He grunted out painfully before violently coughing up blood. "He went on' ahead not 15 minutes ago. If you were go to now, then, you could catch up to him before he...is...lost...outside...of..." The ninja let out his last breath before he passed away from the loss of blood.

Yugito sighed in dispair before closing the eyes of the now dead ninja respectfully. Standing up Yugito looked in the direction Naruto had gone and walked over the now dead bodies of the ninjas.

She now has two choices.


Choice 1: She can go after him without using chakra and give her the element of surprise when she catches up to him. The downside to this is Yugito will be slightly tired when she reaches the rogue Jinchuuriki. So she won't be fighting at full capacity.

Choice 2: She can go after him using chakra. This will allow her to catch up to him rather quickly at the cost of giving herself away, and allowing Naruto ample time to prepare to face her. The upside to this however, if Naruto gets violent and fights her, then she is able to transform into Matatabi, the Two Tailed Cat that is sealed inside of her.
